name: Best Kept Secret

config_properties.name: Best Kept Secret
config_properties.description: An indie music festival in Hilvarenbeek, Netherlands, featuring alternative, indie rock, and electronic music.

ai_profile:
**Best Kept Secret 2026: A Celebration of Diversity and Talent**

The 2026 edition of Best Kept Secret brings together 52 eclectic artists from 16 countries, showcasing a diverse array of genres and cultures. With a strong representation from the USA (11 acts) and the Netherlands (10 acts), the lineup also features talent from countries like Ghana, South Africa, and Brazil, highlighting a global spectrum of musical voices. Genres range from the pulsating beats of electronic and house to the raw energy of post-punk, indie rock, and hip-hop, creating a rich tapestry of sounds for festivalgoers to enjoy.

Diversity is at the heart of this year’s festival, with representation from male, female, mixed-gender, and non-binary artists. While male artists make up the majority, the inclusion of female and mixed-gender acts, as well as artists of color (12 out of 52), ensures a more inclusive platform for creative expression. The festival also features three DJs, adding an extra layer of energy to the vibrant lineup.

With an average artist rating of 7.2 based on 76.9% of rated acts, festivalgoers can anticipate high-quality performances. Notably, 98.1% of the lineup has Spotify links available, making it easy to explore the artists and their music ahead of the event. Best Kept Secret 2026 promises to be a dynamic blend of genres, cultures, and talent—continuing its tradition of curating a unique and inclusive musical experience.
